  3. JT&MARCUS

Juntae

Jaejun

Introduction

JT&MARCUS is a male duo signed under MLD Entertainment. They made their debut on October 14, 2021, with the digital single “Dear You.” The duo consists of former TREI members Kim Jun Tae and Lee Jae Jun, who signed an exclusive contract with MLD Entertainment on October 30, 2020. Their collaboration as JT&MARCUS began shortly after.

The group had their debut with the digital single “Dear You” released on October 14, 2021. Later that year, on December 23, 2021, they followed up with their second digital single titled “First.”

In 2023, JT&MARCUS unveiled their third digital single, “Sentimotion,” which showcased their evolving sound and artistic direction.

While Jaejun was part of the group TAN, JT&MARCUS took a hiatus. However, after TAN disbanded, Jaejun revealed that the duo was preparing for a comeback in 2024. Fans are eagerly anticipating their return, and the duo has dropped hints about opening official accounts soon.However, with both members departing from MLD Entertainment and joining JWIN to debut as part of the trio IN A MINUTE, the future of the duo remains uncertain.
